We are glad to see you again!: We are glad to see you again!
aboutUs.subtitle: We're on a mission to provide car buyers and sellers with the best marketplace experience, making car transactions easier and more trustworthy worldwide.
aboutUs.welcomeTitle: Welcome to TurboCar — enhance your experience while helping the car community thrive
aboutUs.welcomeText1: Start your journey today and make a difference in the car marketplace — all for free! Check out our available opportunities below and join us in our mission to improve the lives of car buyers and sellers.
aboutUs.welcomeText2: We support car dealers and private sellers of all sizes, helping them grow while contributing to the automotive community. Our curated collection of tools and resources empowers you to make a positive impact, bringing quality cars and loving owners together.
aboutUs.howToBuySubtitle: Follow these simple steps to find and purchase your perfect vehicle
aboutUs.step1Desc: Explore our extensive collection of cars. Use filters to find vehicles by brand, type, price range, location, and more. Save your favorites for later comparison.
aboutUs.step2Desc: Click on any car to see detailed information including specifications, images, condition, mileage, and seller information. Contact the seller directly through our platform.
aboutUs.step3Desc: Communicate with the seller to negotiate the price and arrange payment. We provide secure payment options and transaction support to ensure a safe purchase.
aboutUs.step4Desc: Finalize the transaction, complete all paperwork, and take ownership of your new car. Our team is here to assist you throughout the entire process.
aboutUs.howToRentSubtitle: Rent a car quickly and easily with our streamlined rental process
aboutUs.rentStep1Desc: Search for available rental cars by location, date, car type, and price. View real-time availability and compare different rental options.
aboutUs.rentStep2Desc: Choose your rental start and end dates. Check minimum and maximum rental periods for each vehicle. Some cars may have specific rental duration requirements.
aboutUs.rentStep3Desc: Review rental terms, pricing, and any additional fees. Complete your booking with secure payment. You'll receive a confirmation with all rental details.
aboutUs.rentStep4Desc: Pick up your rental car at the agreed location and time. Enjoy your rental period, then return the vehicle in the same condition. Our platform tracks your rental status.
